title: PC_Billy Blade -Temple of Time-.direct.play.request.- ToeD
description:
The One Eyed Dude 

      is back with

================================================================
=> Billy Blade and the Temple of Time -.direct.play.request.- <=
================================================================
====-> ripped:  nothing  <=-========-=> added: experience <-====
================================================================


<->( about )<-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><->

The shimmering stone of supernatural powers is said to be a controlling 
device that can open the very portals of time. 

When Billy finds the time crystal, something goes terribly wrong and his 
friend Kong the monkey becomes trapped inside it. 

To save Kong, Billy must solve the riddle of the temple and defeat the 
guardians of time. 

His new-found quest sends him back in time to the frozen waste of the
ice age, the sand-swept cities of ancient Persia, and the swashbuckling
shores of the Caribbean!



<->( features )<-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><->

* Defeat the guardians of time and stay alive through the greatest
platform adventure of them all!

* Kong the Monkey has been trapped inside the legendary Time Crystal,
hidden away inside the mysterious Temple of Time!

* Now, Expert adventurer and renowned sword master Billy Blade must 
race through time itself to solve the riddle of the Temple of Time and free
his friend!

* Travel from the Temple of Time to the frozen wastes of teh Ice Age,
beyond the sand-swept cities of Ancient Persia into the swashbuckiling
shores of the Caribbean.

* Wide-ranging dual blade combat system including special power-ups 
such as Blade of Fire and Blade of Speed.

* Battle against lots of cool enemies in more than 40 areas.

* A broad range of puzzle elements and lots of platforms, with tons of moves.

* Special power-ups such as Blade of Fire and Blade of Speed.


<->( Hardware Requirements )<-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><->

PC with Windows 2000/XP ( Vista=DFC )



<->( how to play )<-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><->

1.: Unrar with 7zip.

2.: WinXP users double click: BBoy_WinXP.exe ( must be done )

2b: Vista users double click: BBoy_Vista.exe ( must be done )

3.: double click: MakeDesktopIcon.exe and run game with.



<->( general hints )<-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><->

this one has been requested by several people... happy gaming ya'll !!!
guess the kids will love it, atleast my kids had fun for a few hours... ;).



<->( Special Info )<-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><->

Some virus-scanner recognize the header of a packed .exe file , in this

case its the file > BBoy_.......exe < as a lame virus, because its  

the byte by byte check error of some virustools!. ( h e u r i s t i c s  ). 

Its almost certainly a false positive alert from overly protective heuristics,

you can read more about in your VirusTool-Manual or VirusTools-WebSite!.

(heuristics). 

<-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><->
 


Greets to the deserving...
